document.full_text: a lone gunman shot dead six people with an automatic weapon as he walked calmly through a dutch shopping mall on saturday, and threatened to blow up three other shopping malls before eventually killing himself.
document.title: lone gunman shoots six dead in dutch shopping mall
lines_and_colors: a lone gunman shot dead six people with an automatic weapon as he walked calmly through a dutch shopping mall on saturday, and threatened to blow up three other shopping malls before eventually killing himself.
